title: 3 Fast Ways to Block and Unblock Contacts on WhatsApp

steps.title: Open WhatsApp.
steps.content: Open WhatsApp. Tap the WhatsApp app icon, which resembles a white phone and speech bubble outline on a green background. This will open WhatsApp to the last page you had open if you're signed into your account. If you aren't signed into WhatsApp, tap Agree & Continue and then follow the on-screen prompts to verify your WhatsApp number.

steps.title: Tap Settings.
steps.content: Tap Settings . It's in the bottom-right corner of the screen. [1] X Research source If WhatsApp opens to a chat conversation, first tap the "Back" button in the top-left corner of the screen.

steps.title: Tap Account.
steps.content: Tap Account . This is near the top of the Settings page.

steps.title: Tap Privacy.
steps.content: Tap Privacy . It's at the top of the Account page.

steps.title: Tap Blocked.
steps.content: Tap Blocked . You'll find this near the bottom of the Privacy page. Doing so opens your WhatsApp block list.

steps.title: Tap Add New….
steps.content: Tap Add New… . It's at the top of the page. If you have any contacts blocked, Add New... will appear below the bottom contact's name.

steps.title: Select a contact to block.
steps.content: Select a contact to block. Tap the name of the contact whom you want to block to add them to your block list.

steps.title: Unblock the contact
steps.content: Unblock the contact if necessary. If you ever want to unblock the contact, do the following: Tap Edit in the top-right corner of the "Blocked" page. Tap the red circle to the left of the name of the contact whom you want to unblock. Tap Unblock to the right of the contact's name.

steps.title: Block a contact from a chat.
steps.content: Block a contact from a chat. If you want to block someone who isn't in your contacts, you can block them from within their chat settings: Tap the chat with the person whom you want to block. Tap the contact's name or number at the top of the chat page. Scroll down and tap Block Contact . Tap Block when prompted.

steps.title: Open WhatsApp.
steps.content: Open WhatsApp. Tap the WhatsApp app icon, which resembles a white phone and speech bubble outline on a green background. This will open WhatsApp to the last page you had open if you're signed into your account. If you aren't signed into WhatsApp, tap AGREE AND CONTINUE and then follow the on-screen prompts to verify your WhatsApp number.

steps.title: Tap ⋮.
steps.content: Tap ⋮ . It's in the top-right corner of the WhatsApp main screen. A drop-down menu will appear. If WhatsApp loads to a conversation when you open it, first tap your Android's "Back" button before tapping the ⋮ icon.

steps.title: Tap Settings.
steps.content: Tap Settings . This option is in the drop-down menu.

steps.title: Tap Privacy.
steps.content: Tap Privacy . You'll find this near the top of the page.

steps.title: Tap Blocked contacts.
steps.content: Tap Blocked contacts . It's near the bottom of the Privacy page, just under the "Messaging" heading. Doing so opens your block list.

steps.title: Tap the "Add" icon.
steps.content: Tap the "Add" icon. This person-shaped icon with a plus sign next to it is in the top-right corner of the screen. Your Android's WhatsApp contacts list will open.

steps.title: Select a contact.
steps.content: Select a contact. Tap the contact whom you want to block. Doing so immediately adds the person to your block list.

steps.title: Unblock the contact if necessary.
steps.content: Unblock the contact if necessary. If you ever want to unblock the contact, do the following: Long-press the contact's name on the "Blocked contacts" page. Tap Unblock name when prompted.

steps.title: Block a contact from a chat.
steps.content: Block a contact from a chat. If you want to block someone who isn't in your contacts, you can block them from within their chat settings: Tap the chat with the person whom you want to block. Tap ⋮ in the top-right corner. Tap More . Tap Block .

steps.title: Open WhatsApp Web.
steps.content: Open WhatsApp Web . Go to https://web.whatsapp.com/ in your computer's web browser.

steps.title: Sign into WhatsApp Web if necessary.
steps.content: Sign into WhatsApp Web if necessary. If you aren't signed into WhatsApp Web in your browser, do one of the following (depending on your smartphone) before proceeding: iPhone — Tap Settings in the bottom-right corner of the main WhatsApp page, tap WhatsApp Web/Desktop , point your iPhone's camera at the QR code on the right side of the WhatsApp Web page on your computer, and wait for the code to scan. Android — Tap ⋮ in the top-right corner of the main WhatsApp page, tap WhatsApp Web in the drop-down menu, point your Android's camera at the QR code on the right side of the WhatsApp Web page on your computer, and wait for the code to scan.

steps.title: Click a chat.
steps.content: Click a chat. You'll see a list of open chats with your contacts in the left panel. If needed, enter a name in the search bar to quickly find a conversation.

steps.title: Click ⋮.
steps.content: Click ⋮ . This is in the top-right corner of the Chats window.

steps.title: Click Block.
steps.content: Click Block . This is in the drop-down menu.

steps.title: Click Block again.
steps.content: Click Block again. The contact will be blocked. If you also want to report the user, make sure the box is checked next to Report to WhatsApp .
